tool_description: Creates and manages assessment schedules based on child's age, developmental needs, and recommended assessment frequencies.

assessment_types.description: Types of assessments to schedule: formal, informal, observation, parent_report

frequency.description: Assessment frequency: weekly, biweekly, monthly, quarterly

priority_domains.description: Developmental domains to prioritize in assessments

duration_months.description: How many months ahead to schedule (1-24)

error_messages: Invalid profile ID: Profile not found in system
Invalid assessment type: Use formal, informal, observation, or parent_report
Invalid frequency: Choose weekly, biweekly, monthly, or quarterly
Invalid duration: Must be between 1 and 24 months
Past start date: Start date cannot be in the past
usage: Provide a child's profile ID and specify assessment types and frequency to generate an automated assessment schedule.

schedule_id.description: Unique identifier for the assessment schedule

next_assessment.description: Date and time of next scheduled assessment
